meanings.sent1: She was specially happy to see her best friend after a long time.

meanings.definition: In a special or specific manner
meanings.sent1: The cake was specially made for her birthday party.
meanings.sent2: He followed the recipe specially to ensure the dish turned out perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The dog wagged its tail specially when it saw its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The stars twinkled specially brightly in the clear night sky.
meanings.sent5: The flowers were arranged specially for the royal visit.
